name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience in automated testing and quality assurance within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **C#**, **GitLab**, **PowerShell**, and automated testing frameworks like **Pytest**. I possess strong analytical skills and excel in performing tests on diverse operating systems, including **Windows**, **Linux**, and **Unix**. My expertise in **DNS**, **DHCP**, and virtualization technologies contributes to the robustness of the systems I test.

I have a proven track record of leveraging teamwork to enhance product quality and compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My strong communication skills in English facilitate effective collaboration within cross-functional teams. I am passionate about delivering high-performance solutions, having led projects that integrate automation and continuous improvement strategies.
